item.title: Today’s Wordle #1679: Hints and Answer for January 23, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1679 for January 23, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, January 23, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1679 is a challenging puzzle. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4.6 of 6 guesses. That makes it slightly easier as the 4.8-guess average from January 22.

General Wordle Hints For January 23

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word is used as a title, not a description.
  • Hint 2: It’s most often found in historical or formal contexts.
  • Hint 3: The word refers to a person, not a place or object.
  • Hint 4: You’re more likely to see it in history books or period pieces than modern headlines

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1679 for January 23, 2026.

Starter Words For January 23, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • BACON
  • ROBIN
  • BOARD
  • BORED

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1679 On January 23, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: BARON

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

BARON is a noun that means “a member of the lowest grade of nobility”.

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1678 on January 22, 2026

Answer: CLINK

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1679?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on January 24 will be Wordle Game #1680.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Xbox Developer Direct 2026—Everything Announced
item.content:encoded:
It’s time to be directed by Xbox once again. The fourth annual Xbox Developer Direct is here for 2026, and with Microsoft celebrating the 25th anniversary of Xbox, it’s certain to be a big show to kick off the year.

Xbox Developer Direct 2026 starts at 1pm ET/6pm GMT and airs on all official Xbox channels. This year’s event has three games advertised so far.

Players will get their first look at gameplay for Forza Horizon 6, a deeper dive into Fable, and new details for Game Freak’s—yes, that Game Freak—Beast of Reincarnation. There are also rumors of a surprise game or two making the rounds, but fans will just have to tune in and see if those turn out to be true.

To stop you from having to go elsewhere, though, you can watch it, in full, in the video below. And don’t forget to leave your thoughts on everything down in the comments and join the discussion with other games in the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

Everything Announced At Xbox Developer Direct 2026

Everything below appears in the order it was shown. There will also be links to Insider Gaming’s full coverage of the games and news that were announced.

This story will begin updating shortly after 1pm EST. Be sure to bookmark this page and refresh to get all of the latest updates from the Xbox Developer Direct.

For more Insider Gaming, read about Beyond Good & Evil 2 surviving the announced restructuring at Ubisoft. And for more Insider Gaming delivered directly to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.
